item.title: EP 82 - Harry FRAUD-er? Did JK Rowling Write The Harry Potter Books?
item.itunes:title: Harry FRAUD-er? Did JK Rowling Write The Harry Potter Books?
item.description:
Today we take a trip to the cinemas to verify the claim that "The Conjuring 2" is a haunted film, then we look into the conspiracy that JK Rowling is just an actress and did not write the worldwide best selling Harry Potter novels.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Claims that "The Conjuring 2" is cursed seem pretty weak at first. But when a corpse and a man go missing in India after watching the film, we have to take a second look at this story.

Then we open up a book. A book known as "JK Rowling And The Possible Fraud." Did she really have a rags-to-riches story and become the most successful novelist of all time? Or is her life, and the books themselves, just one big marketing scam?

Links:

"The Conjuring" - - How I Spent My Dumber Vacation

http://videovandals.blogspot.com/2014/02/the-conjuring-how-i-spent-my-dumber.html

Man dies while watching The Conjuring 2

https://www.khaleejtimes.com/international/india/man-dies-while-watching-the-conjuring-2

THE CONJURING 2 MOVIE SUMMONING REAL DEMONS!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k0ZD8J0hDS8

Man dies in cinema while watching The Conjuring 2 – and body goes missing

https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2016/06/18/man-dies-in-cinema-while-watching-the-conjuring-2--and-body-goes/

The body of a man who died during ‘The Conjuring 2’ is missing

https://nypost.com/2016/06/19/the-body-of-a-man-who-died-during-the-conjuring-2-is-missing/

A man died while watching this horror film and his body is now missing

https://www.news.com.au/world/asia/a-man-died-while-watching-this-horror-film-and-his-body-is-now-missing/news-story/c9ab6308f8044a68c127a67e9744c7eb

But Did J.K. Rowling REALLY Write ‘Harry Potter’?

https://omgfacts.com/but-did-j-k-rowling-really-write-harry-potter/

J K Rowling

http://forum.objectivismonline.com/index.php?/topic/8256-j-k-rowling/

Don't Tell This To Rowling

https://news.google.com/newspapers?id=haokAAAAIBAJ&sjid=43ADAAAAIBAJ&pg=6798%2C6688102

Film director sparks debate over origins of 'Harry Potter'

https://web.archive.org/web/20060114110703/http://www.aftenposten.no/english/local/article1169209.ece

Pansy Parkinson

http://harrypotter.wikia.com/wiki/Pansy_Parkinson

16 Harry Potter Characters Who Were Replaced Between Movies

https://diply.com/article/harry-potter-characters-replaced-between-movies?publisher=dip-video&config=62

In which ways did J.K. Rowling regulate the Harry Potter films?

https://movies.stackexchange.com/questions/88063/in-which-ways-did-j-k-rowling-regulate-the-harry-potter-films

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
